description:
Perfectly designed for steady steps, as it features a single, slim sole that ideally balances the heel height with the rest of the design of the sleek shoe. You can pair it with skirts and skinny pants.
PU vamp, textured and soft.
Rubber Outsole and ABS heel, anti-slip effectively.
Heel Height: 2 5/9 inches, ShaftHeight: 3 7/8 inches.
bullets:
Vamp: PU; Outsole: TPR; Heel: ABS
 Low Platform, Round Toe, Padded Insole, Lug Sole; Chunky Heel, Lace Up Decor, Side Zipper
 Occasion: Office, Interview, Party, Casual, Halloween days, Christmas Days, Evening
 Good choice for halloween costumes and role playing
 Red, Black, Burgundy, Leopard Print: Heel Height: 2 1/8 inches; Coffee Color: Heel Height: 3 1/2 inches, Platform Height: 1 3/8 inches; ShaftHeight: 3 7/8 inches
features: Care and Cleaning: Spot or Wipe Clean
